main.name: Aaren Chu
main.description: who's constantly improving and keeping up to date with technology
main.bio: My programming interests include full-stack development, security, game design and machine learning. In my spare time, I enjoy snowboarding (in the winter), hiking, bouldering indoors, and walking my dog.
main.contactmessage: Please feel free to contact me using this form here or directly via my e-mail address.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.degree: Honours Bachelor of Science - Computer Science Co-op
education.description: Software Engineer Specialist. cGPA: 3.2. Dean's List (2017-2019)

work.title: Software Developer I
work.description: Updated an important application to modern tech stack of React, Redux, Java Springboot and Microsoft SQL Server. Collaborated with team in design changes and implementing client requirements. Reviewed and critiqued code.

work.title: Software Developer Intern/Co-op
work.description: Designed the schema for a AWS DynamoDB database. Implemented Python scripts to clear, query and update data in database. Collaborated with coworker to design a simple API that gets data from the database.

work.title: Teaching Assistant
work.description: Strengthened students’ understanding of Python and unit testing by holding office hours and answering their questions. Collaborated with other TA’s to brainstorm solutions to midterms and final exams and fairly evaluate students on their understanding of the course.
